Professional Summary
I am a HR Assistant who can reflect your values of excellence & quality.
I provide excellent customer service for a variety of services while multi — tasking , maintaining confidentiality, and interacting with management, employees, customers, and vendors.
I am currently furthering my education in the medical field.
I look forward to working in an environment that enables me use of my skills to gain further experience.

Strong organizational skills Sharp problem solver Active listening skills

<JD_START>
Job Title: Recruiter (7547)

Location: Vancouver, WA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Administrative, Human Resources, Sales

Description:
Overview: ACS Professional Staffing is looking for an enthusiastic employee to join our team. The Recruiter position will be responsible for developing and executing recruiting strategies to identify and secure top talent for open positions across various geographies. This position will manage the candidate tracking process and use different tools, practices, and applicant tracking systems to source, screen, and evaluate candidates. Building strong relationships with candidates through excellent customer service is key. This is a hybrid position located in Vancouver, WA. 
*This position requires a candidate who can work from?8am to 5pm, Monday through Friday. In addition, an in-office presence is expected for the first 90 days, and then the expectation will transition to a Hybrid work schedule of a minimum of 2 days per week in the office. 
Pay range: $55K – $65K base salary DOE + uncapped commission
Benefits: Paid holidays: 11PTO: Starting at 10 daysSick Leave: Up to 56 hours per year (prorated based on start date)EAP: Employee Assistance ProgramBenefit Options Available: Medical, Dental, Vision, FSA, DCA, LPFSA, HSA, Group Life/AD&D, Voluntary Life/AD&D, Voluntary Short-Term Disability, Voluntary Long-Term Disability, Voluntary Critical Illness, Voluntary Accident, 401k (immediately eligible for employee and employer contributions – employer match up to 4%)Other benefits include the following: Calm App, Access Perks, Brio Health
Responsibilities:Acquire a thorough understanding of job requisition/description for required competencies, skills, and the knowledge required of successful applicantsDevelop an ongoing and diverse candidate pipeline using research, networking, and database mining.Identify and implement sourcing strategies based on the job position by creatively conducting research and utilizing a variety of technical tools to identify and attract qualified candidatesEstablish candidate qualifications by screening applicants; administering tests; and completing reference checksUses a variety of interview techniques to select the most qualified candidateExplain company personnel policies, benefits, and procedures to employees or job applicantsIdentify and submit qualified candidates to the Sales team or VMS based on the provided job descriptionSupport recruiting itineraries by making travel arrangements; setting up interview schedules; and arranging applicant visits, to organization locationsProcess and review resumes evaluating qualifications or eligibility of applicantsEnter and maintain candidate information into the candidate applicant tracking system as well as vendor management systems (if applicable) dailyMaintain applicant tracking system by entering and updating requisition, sourcing, profiling, resume management, matching, tracking, and hiring informationPresent offers and conduct offer negotiations with candidatesAcquire and maintain knowledge of federal and state laws regarding employment practicesUse relevant information and individual judgment to determine whether events or processes comply with laws, regulations, or standardsContinuously develop applicant base through recruiting, reactivating, and referralsDetermine the applicant’s qualification for placement and assignment removalCapable of relating to individuals at all levels – unique situations will present themselves; you must be sensitive to the business needs and the employee’s goodwillBe able to develop a track record of performance against quotas in recruiting, and sourcing and be savvy enough to handle large volumes of qualified candidatesEnhances department and organization reputation by accepting ownership for accomplishing new and different requests; and exploring opportunities to add value to job accomplishmentsPerforms other duties as assigned
Requirements: Bachelor’s Degree preferred or 1-4 years of relative experience in place of a degree1+ years of recruiting and/or staffing industry experience requiredTechnical writing proficiency requiredExperience working in a goal-driven environment and capable of meeting and exceeding those goals requiredStrong customer service focus and commitment to continuous improvement requiredAbility to proactively network and establish successful working relationships with candidatesDisplay professionalism in all business interactionsPossess a consultative approach and focus on building long-term relationshipsOutstanding verbal and written communication skillsExtensive knowledge, understanding, and ability to use modern technologySelf-starter that can work with minimal supervision in a fast-paced business environmentExceptional interpersonal skills including verbal; non-verbal; listening; team-orientation; negotiation; conflict resolution; problem solving and decision-makingAbility to work independently as well as in a teamAbility to prioritize based on urgency and importance and shift priorities throughout the day as neededAbility to effectively present information and respond to questions from managers, executives, candidates, sales team, and clientsThe ability to listen and understand information and ideasDemonstrated proficiency in utilizing a variety of recruitment strategies (i.e., cold calling, direct sourcing, networking, etc.)The ability to observe, receive, and otherwise obtain information from all relevant sourcesAbility to prioritize, multi-task, problem solve while maintaining flexibility in projects and relationshipsMust understand full-cycle professional staff augmentation and direct hire placementProficient with using job boards/resume databases, job postings, and networking
Work sponsorship is not available currently. No third-party candidates are considered for this position.
ACS Professional Staffing will provide equal employment opportunities to all applicants without regard to the applicant’s race, color, religion, sex, gender, genetic information, national origin, age, veteran status, disability status, or any other status protected by federal or state law. The company will provide reasonable accommodation to allow an applicant to participate in the hiring process if so requested.
If you have any questions about the job posting, please contact recruiting@acsprostaffing.com
If you have any questions about our Reasonable Accommodation Policy, please feel free to email hr@acsprostaffing.com

Experience Level (if available): Associate
<JD_END>
